### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5)

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0) and offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-18.5, y=27.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=-5.5, y=25.5)
Consists of multiple pipes

### Electricity group at position(x=-18.5, y=19.5)
Consists of multiple small electric poles

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected by a pipe.
- Make sure that the pipe group is not empty and that the fluid system is correctly set up.

### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure that the tile where you want to place the pipe is not occupied by another entity.
- Make sure that you are not trying to place a pipe in water.

### Errors when checking pipe group fluid system
- Ensure that the pipe group has a fluid system attribute.
- Make sure that you are checking the correct pipe group.

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler are close enough to be connected by a pipe.
- Make sure that the pipe group is not empty and that the fluid system is correctly set up.
